Class WelcomeController

java.lang.Object
WelcomeController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllTimeLeaderboardController, LeaderboardController, WordleController
public class WelcomeController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that is used to control the first page of the GUI
Author:
Samuel Nicklaus
See Also:
PopupController, WordleController, LeaderboardController

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane background
    background is a Gridpane that is the background of the scene
    protected Client client
    is the client that is passed to other controllers to keep track of user
    private javafx.scene.control.Button instructions
    Is a button that opens up a list of instructions of the program
    private javafx.scene.control.Button leaderboardButton
    Is a button that opens up the leaderboard rankings
    protected javafx.scene.Parent root
    Is the root of the GUI
    protected javafx.scene.Scene scene
    Is the scene the GUI
    protected javafx.stage.Stage stage
    Is the stage of the GUI
    private javafx.scene.control.Button startButton
    Is a button that starts the first round of wordle
    private javafx.scene.control.TextField userName
    Is a textfield that takes in user input that is used to make a username
    private javafx.scene.text.Text warningText
    is the text above the text field asking for username
